description: Currently enrolled in school, exploring loan options

questions.text: How much can I borrow for my degree program?
What's the difference between subsidized and unsubsidized loans?
When do I need to start repaying my loans?
Can I use loans for living expenses?
What is the Student Aid Index (SAI), and how does it affect my eligibility for federal student aid?
Can you explain how my academic calendar and payment periods influence when I receive my federal student loan disbursements?
What are the key differences between Direct Subsidized and Unsubsidized Loans, and which one is more suitable for my situation?
What are my repayment options after graduation?
How do income-driven repayment plans work?
Can I consolidate my federal student loans?
What happens during my grace period?
What are my repayment options for federal student loans after my grace period ends, and how do I choose the best one?
I'm considering consolidating my federal student loans. What are the pros and cons, and how does the process work?
My loan servicer is reporting missed payments from my grace period, but I thought payments weren't due yet. What should I do?

description: Parent or family member helping with education financing

questions.text: Should I take a PLUS loan or help my child borrow?
What are the credit requirements for Parent PLUS loans?
How can I help my child understand their loan responsibilities?
What tax benefits are available for education expenses?
As a parent, what information do I need to provide on the FAFSA, and how does my income affect my child's financial aid?
What are the eligibility requirements and responsibilities for taking out a Direct PLUS Loan for my child's education?
I'm concerned about the privacy of my personal and financial data related to my child's student loans. What protections are in place, and what if there's a data breach?
Can I lower my monthly payment amount?
How do I apply for loan forgiveness programs?
What should I do if I'm having trouble making payments?
Can I pay off my loans early without penalties?
My monthly student loan payments have increased unexpectedly. How can I understand the reason for this change and explore options to lower them?
I've made payments, but my loan balance doesn't seem to be decreasing, or payments aren't being applied correctly. How can I get a full accounting of my loan and resolve these discrepancies?
My credit score was negatively impacted due to a reported delinquency, but I believe it was an error by my servicer. What steps can I take to dispute this and have it corrected?

description: Working in public service, eligible for PSLF

questions.text: Do I qualify for Public Service Loan Forgiveness?
How do I certify my employment for PSLF?
What payment plan is best for PSLF?
How many qualifying payments have I made?
What are the specific criteria for Public Service Loan Forgiveness (PSLF), and how do I ensure my employment qualifies?
How do I certify my employment for PSLF, and what should I do if my servicer isn't correctly tracking my qualifying payments?
Can you explain the process for consolidating loans for PSLF, and how does it affects my payment count?

description: Experiencing financial hardship with loan payments

questions.text: I can't make my loan payments, what are my options?
How do I apply for deferment or forbearance?

How can I rehabilitate defaulted loans?
I'm struggling to make my student loan payments. What are my options for temporary relief, such as forbearance or deferment?
What are the consequences of defaulting on a federal student loan, and what steps can I take to rehabilitate or resolve a defaulted loan?
I believe I qualify for a loan discharge due to school closure or misrepresentation. What is the process for applying for borrower defense to repayment?

What resources are available for understanding my repayment options?

description: Seeking accessible information and support options

questions.text: What loan discharge options are available for students with disabilities?

What accommodations are available for borrowers who need accessible communication formats?

What happens to my loans if my disability status changes after receiving a discharge?
